author: raghushantha
body:
Changes to documentation do not need CI runs.

However changes to tools/test/assets/src needs CI.

This will speed up our doc related checkins

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: This was already attempted in https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/1478 but proved not to be possible to do reliably.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Since CI runs the spell checker, I don't think this is relevant anymore.

title: Skip CI runs for PRs that do not result in code change
